value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE GAME - Mass Tactical Nukes! (Maru vs Zest)
value.excerpt: Another amazing game of top-level StarCraft 2. This time around it is time for a Terran versus Protoss that goes to the late game. Mass Gateway, Command Center, Sky Toss, Sky Terran and Tactical Nukes are all part of this epic match.  Zest vs Dark: https://youtu.be/mUG5ryGpiV8  Support my work on Patreon:

value.title: StarCraft 2: MASS Marines to Grandmaster!
value.excerpt: Welcome to a BRAND NEW Series on the StarCraft ladder! This is the "Mass Marines to Grandmaster" challenge, where the only attacking unit that I'm allowed to make is Marines - and that's it! I am allowed to make Medivacs just so that the gaemplay is not too monotonous, but I believe I could even make

In this game he opens up with a Reaper Bunker rush, then transitions towards Battlecruisers and eventually leads to Mech and quadruple Nukes.  Florencio

value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MID-GAME BUNKER "RUSH"! (PartinG vs Cure)
value.excerpt: A really fun series of professional StarCraft 2 between PartinG and Cure. In this best-of-3 we see a variety of openers from both players and in two of them, Cure goes for a timing attack where he's building structures like Bunkers on his opponent's side of the map. value.title: StarCraft 2: uThermal's SUPER SLOW Terran Push!

value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED Result! (Maru vs Harstem)
value.excerpt: Very fun match of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru and Harstem. While most of the time we see Protoss players forced into Colossus because of Marine Marauder unit compositions, in this game Harstem decides to go for Carriers with Disruptors because of Maru's Mech army. value.excerpt: Professional match of top level Korean StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and Cure (Terran).
